questions.question: What is Artificial Intelligence?
answers: Artificial Intelligence enables machines to learn from data and make decisions.
AI is the ability of a computer to perform tasks that typically require human intelligence.
Artificial Intelligence refers to systems that mimic human cognitive abilities.

questions.question: What is Machine Learning?
answers: Machine learning is a subset of AI that trains algorithms to learn from data.
ML is a field that allows computers to improve automatically through experience.
Machine learning enables systems to identify patterns in data and make predictions.

questions.question: Explain Deep Learning.
answers: Deep learning uses neural networks with many layers to process data.
It is a subset of machine learning focused on large neural networks.
Deep learning models learn hierarchical representations from data.
